## Professional Summary

Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience building scalable web applications and data systems. Specialized in cloud-native architecture, microservices, and data engineering on AWS and GCP. Proven track record of optimizing systems serving millions of users while reducing costs by 40%.

## Work Experience

### Senior Software Engineer at TechCorp Inc
**January 2020 - Present** | San Francisco, CA | Hybrid

Lead engineer for the data platform team, responsible for building and maintaining data pipelines processing 100TB+ daily.

**Key Achievements:**
- Reduced API response time by 60% through caching optimization using Redis, improving experience for 2M+ users daily
- Built distributed data pipeline processing 50TB daily across 5 microservices using Apache Kafka and Spark
- Mentored 4 junior engineers, leading to 2 promotions within 12 months
- Architected migration from monolith to microservices, reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes

**Technologies:** Python, Django, PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker, AWS, Kubernetes, Apache Kafka, Apache Spark

---

### Software Engineer at DataFlow Systems
**June 2017 - December 2019** | Remote

Full-stack developer building healthcare data interoperability platform using FHIR standards.

**Key Achievements:**
- Implemented FHIR R4 integration layer supporting 500K+ patient records
- Developed real-time ETL pipeline reducing data sync latency from 4 hours to 15 minutes
- Optimized database queries reducing server costs by 35%

**Technologies:** Node.js, React, MongoDB, AWS Lambda, DynamoDB

---

### Junior Developer at StartupXYZ
**July 2015 - May 2017** | New York, NY | Onsite

**Key Achievements:**
